name: The Kitty Companion (DEMO)
description:
*PLEASE NOTE*

Only Miwa's route is currently out. The others will be out in a few months!

LOL this game is still a working progess

Hey, hey you! Yeah you!

Have you been feeling lonely as of late? Maybe your girlfriend dumped you or you lost your job? Well I've got the product just for you!

Introducing the latest in technology, The Kitty Companion 3000!

A robotic cat girl designed to keep you company and answer your greatest desires and there's so many to choose from

Do you want a sweet and loving cinnamon roll? Miwa is the girl for you!

Have a thing for tsunderes or bratty girls? Sakura is here for you!

Maybe someone a little more mature and intelligent? Kurai is only one purchase away!

It's the purrfect offer so if you're feline pretty good, it'd be so nya-ce of you to get one

Get your Kitty Companion today! 

No refunds!

(Each sold separately. CuteCat.Corp is not responsible for any injury, harm or death caused by their products. Purchase at own risk)

~ Mango

- Nameable Male MC!

- 3 CGS!

- 5, 301 words~

- 10 unique endings!

- Roughly 20 mins of gameplay for each cat girl!

- Adorable cat girls!

- Bad/Suggestive language

- Violence/murder/body horror (offscreen)

- Visible blood

- Suicide (offscreen)

- Mentions of physical/verbal abuse

The creator does not condone this behavior. Any relation to real people, places or events is purely coincidental

Story and code by LunarMoon (me!)

Character art by NoranekoGames (https://noranekogames.itch.io/)

Voice acting by Cici Fyre (https://cicifyre.itch.io/)

SFX by Zapsplat.com

Textbox by PsychoPass (https://cloudnovel.net/PsychoPass/GUI/simple-pink-textbox)

Extra artwork by nekomachines (https://pixabay.com/users/nekomachines-19125993/)

Backgrounds by:

- NoranekoGames

- Lornn (https://lornn.itch.io/)

- Jennova21 (https://jennova21.itch.io/)

- Martaan Hof (https://www.artstation.com/maartenhof)

Music by:

- Kevin McLeod (https://www.youtube.com/@KevinMacLeodArchive)

- Zapsplat.com (https://www.zapsplat.com/)

Fonts by:

"Caviar Dreams" by Lauren Thompson( https://www.dafont.com/lauren-thompson.d1997)

"Love Story" by NJ Studio (https://www.dafont.com/nj-studio.d8396)

MADE WITH RENPY
